DOC.brief_summary: This study seek investigate safety efficacy biolimus-eluting stent ( BES ) biodegradable polymer compare everolimus-eluting stent ( EES ) durable polymer 3 year follow-up .
DOC.detailed_description: A group 814 consecutive patient undergo percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) enrol 2007 2010 , 527 treat EES 287 BES implantation . Clinical outcome compare 200 pair use propensity score matching . The primary endpoint composite death , myocardial infarction ( MI ) target vessel revascularisation ( TVR ) two-year follow-up .
DOC.criteria: patient least one BES EES de novo stenosis patient least one nonstudy stent patient study stent patient life expectancy < 3 year
